Re: Systems Requirement for YouTube Video Production
Inbox


Vasanth Vijayabaskar
Mar 3, 2025, 3:36 PM

+Praveen G 

On Mon, Mar 3, 2025 at 3:26 PM Vasanth Vijayabaskar <vasanth@guvi.in> wrote:
Any update on this?

On Wed, Dec 18, 2024 at 5:28 AM Charles R <charles@guvi.in> wrote:

Dear Solomon,

Please find the employee details below:

Rahul J (G966)

Jai Surya (G1046)

Subin (C044)


If you need any further information, feel free to contact me.

On Tue, 17 Dec 2024, 10:03 pm Solomon Elisha Caleb D, <solomonelisha@guvi.in> wrote:
Dear Sir,

As per our conversation, you had mentioned that 3 employees will be assigned to work on these desktop computers. Requesting you to mention the employees with their employee ID, so that we can take your request forward for the next process.

Thanks and Regards,
Solomon Elisha Caleb

On Tue, 17 Dec 2024 at 21:45, Charles R <charles@guvi.in> wrote:
As discussed with Solomon, the requirement for YouTube video production involves three high-end production systems for the office. These systems are essential for editing 4K resolution footage and fast rendering, ensuring an efficient workflow for post-production. 


System Specifications:

Processor: Ryzen 9 7900X
Graphics: Nvidia 4070 Ti Super - 16GB
Motherboard: Asus X670E Motherboard
RAM: Corsair 16GB RAM x 2
Storage: 1TB SSD + 2TB HDD
Monitor and Keyboard 
  

Kindly provide your support; it would be very helpful  







Thanks and Regards,

Charles R

Sr. Motion Graphics Lead

+919597389429

GUVI Geek Network Private Limited

Vasanth Vijayabaskar

config.prompt: You are an expert email assistant. When given raw email text or prompts, generate professional, clear, and concise email drafts or summaries. Maintain an appropriate tone and structure the content for clarity. Ask follow-up questions if more context is required.
